actor_awards.notes: She received an Academy Award nomination for Best Supporting Actress for her role in 'Merrily We Live' (1938). She is most famously known as Glinda the Good Witch in 'The Wizard of Oz'. She was married to Florenz Ziegfeld Jr. of the Ziegfeld Follies.

filmography.title: The Wizard of Oz
filmography.role_description: The benevolent Witch of the North who guides Dorothy on her journey through Oz.
filmography.plot: Dorothy Gale is swept away from a farm in Kansas to a magical land of Oz in a tornado and embarks on a quest with her new friends to see the Wizard who can help her return home.

filmography.title: Merrily We Live
filmography.role_description: A dizzy society matron who has a habit of hiring tramps as servants, much to her family's dismay.
filmography.plot: A screwball comedy about a wealthy but eccentric woman who takes in a vagrant as a chauffeur, unaware he is actually a writer.

filmography.title: Dinner at Eight
filmography.role_description: A high-strung socialite obsessed with hosting the perfect dinner party for visiting nobility.
filmography.plot: A New York socialite tries to organize a dinner party for visiting nobility, but her guests are dealing with their own major life crises.

filmography.title: Topper
filmography.role_description: The strait-laced and somewhat nagging wife of Cosmo Topper.
filmography.plot: A fun-loving couple, now ghosts, decide to shake up the stuffy lifestyle of their friend, a bank president.

filmography.title: The Man Who Came to Dinner
filmography.role_description: The flustered hostess of the home where the acerbic Sheridan Whiteside is confined.
filmography.plot: A famous radio personality breaks his hip and takes over a suburban family's home, where he is visited by his eccentric friends.

filmography.title: Father of the Bride
filmography.role_description: The mother of the bride who tries to keep the peace between her stressed husband and the wedding chaos.
filmography.plot: A father struggles to cope with the emotional and financial implications of his daughter's upcoming wedding.

filmography.title: A Bill of Divorcement
filmography.role_description: A woman who has divorced her shell-shocked husband and plans to remarry, only for him to return home.
filmography.plot: A man returns home after fifteen years in an asylum to find his wife divorced and about to remarry, and his daughter contemplating her own future.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Top Ten Films

filmography.title: Topper Returns
filmography.role_description: Burke reprises her role as the long-suffering wife of Cosmo Topper in this comedy mystery.
filmography.plot: A ghost enlists the help of Cosmo Topper to find her murderer and save her wealthy friend.

filmography.title: The Young in Heart
filmography.role_description: The mother in a family of con artists who are reformed by the kindness of a wealthy old woman.
filmography.plot: A family of con artists befriends a lonely, rich old woman in hopes of inheriting her fortune, but they end up caring for her.

filmography.title: Topper Takes a Trip
filmography.role_description: The second film in the series, where Clara seeks a divorce while being followed to France by the ghostly Marion Kerby.
filmography.plot: A ghost follows Cosmo Topper to the French Riviera to help him win back his wife.

filmography.title: In This Our Life
filmography.role_description: The mother of two sisters in a tangled web of family drama and betrayal.
filmography.plot: A young woman runs off with her sister's husband, leading to tragedy and a hit-and-run accident.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Top Ten Films

filmography.title: Christopher Strong
filmography.role_description: The dignified and patient wife of a politician who falls for an aviatrix.
filmography.plot: A happily married aristocrat falls in love with a pioneering female pilot, threatening his family and career.

filmography.title: Father's Little Dividend
filmography.role_description: The enthusiastic grandmother-to-be in this sequel to 'Father of the Bride'.
filmography.plot: Stanley Banks struggles to accept that he is going to be a grandfather, while his wife and daughter embrace the news.

filmography.title: Becky Sharp
filmography.role_description: A snobbish aristocrat who snubs the social-climbing Becky Sharp.
filmography.plot: A social-climbing girl attempts to infiltrate the British upper class during the Napoleonic Wars.

filmography.title: The Barkleys of Broadway
filmography.role_description: A wealthy patron of the arts who encourages the female lead to pursue dramatic acting.
filmography.plot: A musical comedy team threatens to break up when the wife decides she wants to be a serious dramatic actress.

filmography.title: Sergeant Rutledge
filmography.role_description: The wife of the commanding officer in this courtroom drama set in the West.
filmography.plot: A black sergeant in the US Cavalry faces a court-martial for the rape and murder of a white woman and the murder of her father.

filmography.title: Craig's Wife
filmography.role_description: The warm-hearted neighbor who is rejected by the cold and controlling Harriet Craig.
filmography.plot: A woman is so obsessed with her home and possessions that she alienates her husband and friends.

filmography.title: The Young Philadelphians
filmography.role_description: A wealthy society matron in this legal drama.
filmography.plot: A young lawyer from a socially prominent family navigates his career and personal life while dealing with the secrets of his heritage.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Supporting Actor (Robert Vaughn)

filmography.title: Piccadilly Jim
filmography.role_description: The formidable aunt of the protagonist in this W.G. Wodehouse adaptation.
filmography.plot: A caricaturist inadvertently insults the family of the girl he loves in his comic strip.

filmography.title: Zenobia
filmography.role_description: The wife of a country doctor who treats a sick elephant.
filmography.plot: A doctor cures a carnival elephant, which then follows him everywhere, causing chaos in his life.

filmography.title: Navy Blues
filmography.role_description: A character in this musical comedy about sailors.
filmography.plot: Two sailors accidentally enlist in the army and cause chaos during training.

filmography.title: The Cheaters
filmography.role_description: The matriarch of a selfish family of snobs who take in a down-and-out actor for Christmas.
filmography.plot: A wealthy family takes in a charity case for the holidays to impress a rich uncle, but the stranger changes their lives.

filmography.title: Girl Trouble
filmography.role_description: A society woman who hires a man she believes to be a butler.
filmography.plot: A South American playboy in New York borrows money from a woman who thinks he is a servant.

filmography.title: Small Town Girl
filmography.role_description: The mother of the main character in this musical comedy.
filmography.plot: A rich playboy is arrested for speeding in a small town and falls for the judge's daughter.

filmography.title: Pepe
filmography.role_description: A cameo appearance as herself in this star-studded musical comedy.
filmography.plot: A Mexican ranch hand travels to Hollywood to retrieve his beloved horse.

filmography.title: Parnell
filmography.role_description: A supporting role in the biopic of Irish politician Charles Stewart Parnell.
filmography.plot: The biography of Irish patriot Charles Stewart Parnell and his love affair with a married woman.
